burtis.modules.network.client

Class ClientSocketService

  • java.lang.Object
    • burtis.modules.network.AbstractSocketService
      • burtis.modules.network.client.ClientSocketService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SocketService

    class ClientSocketService
extends AbstractSocketService
    Manages connection to specified address/port pair. Allows for opening, closing and reopening connection. Connection status can be retrieved. Thread-safety: each action on Socket is done in Locked block.
    Author:
    Amadeusz Sadowski

      • ClientSocketService

        public ClientSocketService(java.lang.String serverAddress,

        Creates new unconnected client connection to server. Call AbstractSocketService.connect() to attempt connection with server.
